subject: Doping (Sports)
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Football
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Only a handful of players in the N.F.L. and Major League Baseball test positive for drugs each year, so the common link in recent tests has captured the attention of antidoping experts.
snippet: Only a handful of players in the N.F.L. and Major League Baseball test positive for drugs each year, so the common link in recent tests has captured the attention of antidoping experts.
